title: Evolution of Online Learning and Language Education Application Strategies for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic online learning platforms (LMS) and intermediate+ language proficiency
context.additional_context: Requires content design optimized for smartphone-based learning. Aims to enhance practical language use through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Students can explain three strategies to enhance language acquisition efficiency in online learning environments.

Utilizing mobile-accessible digital resources (e.g., two podcasts, one translation app), learners can establish a self-directed learning plan executable at least three times weekly and record execution results over two weeks using a learning journal template.

Over 2â€“4 weeks, learners can form teams of two peer learners using online collaboration tools like GitHub Classroom, complete a web-based language learning app with three core features (login, data storage, API integration) using a project management board (Kanban board), and achieve over 4 points (out of 5) in at least two of three peer evaluation rubric items (feature completeness, collaboration engagement, code quality).

resources: Free Language Learning App Integration System
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
